30  package org.apache.tapestry5.internal.plastic.asm.xml;
31  
32  import org.apache.tapestry5.internal.plastic.asm.ClassReader;
33  import org.apache.tapestry5.internal.plastic.asm.ClassWriter;
34  import org.xml.sax.*;
35  import org.xml.sax.ext.LexicalHandler;
36  import org.xml.sax.helpers.AttributesImpl;
37  import org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler;
38  import org.xml.sax.helpers.XMLReaderFactory;
39  
40  import javax.xml.transform.*;
41  import javax.xml.transform.sax.SAXResult;
42  import javax.xml.transform.sax.SAXSource;
43  import javax.xml.transform.sax.SAXTransformerFactory;
44  import javax.xml.transform.sax.TransformerHandler;
45  import javax.xml.transform.stream.StreamSource;
46  import java.io.*;
47  import java.util.zip.ZipEntry;
48  import java.util.zip.ZipInputStream;
49  import java.util.zip.ZipOutputStream;
50  
51  /**
52   * Processor is a command line tool that can be used for bytecode waving
53   * directed by XSL transformation.
54   *
55   * In order to use a concrete XSLT engine, system property
56   * <tt>javax.xml.transform.TransformerFactory</tt> must be set to one of the
57   * following values.
58   * 
59   * <blockquote>
60   * <table border="1" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="3">
61   * <tr>
62   * <td>jd.xslt</td>
63   * <td>jd.xml.xslt.trax.TransformerFactoryImpl</td>
64   * </tr>
65   * 
66   * <tr>
67   * <td>Saxon</td>
68   * <td>net.sf.saxon.TransformerFactoryImpl</td>
69   * </tr>
70   * 
71   * <tr>
72   * <td>Caucho</td>
73   * <td>com.caucho.xsl.Xsl</td>
74   * </tr>
75   * 
76   * <tr>
77   * <td>Xalan interpeter</td>
78   * <td>org.apache.xalan.processor.TransformerFactory</td>
79   * </tr>
80   * 
81   * <tr>
82   * <td>Xalan xsltc</td>
83   * <td>org.apache.xalan.xsltc.trax.TransformerFactoryImpl</td>
84   * </tr>
85   * </table>
86   * </blockquote>
87   * 
88   * @author Eugene Kuleshov
89   */
90  public class Processor {
91  
92      public static final int BYTECODE = 1;
93  
94      public static final int MULTI_XML = 2;
95  
96      public static final int SINGLE_XML = 3;
97  
98      private static final String SINGLE_XML_NAME = "classes.xml";
99  
100     private final int inRepresentation;
101 
102     private final int outRepresentation;
103 
104     private final InputStream input;
105 
106     private final OutputStream output;
107 
108     private final Source xslt;
109 
110     private int n = 0;
111 
112     public Processor(final int inRepresenation, final int outRepresentation,
113             final InputStream input, final OutputStream output,
114             final Source xslt) {
115         this.inRepresentation = inRepresenation;
116         this.outRepresentation = outRepresentation;
117         this.input = input;
118         this.output = output;
119         this.xslt = xslt;
120     }
121 
122     public int process() throws TransformerException, IOException, SAXException {
123         ZipInputStream zis = new ZipInputStream(input);
124         final ZipOutputStream zos = new ZipOutputStream(output);
125         final OutputStreamWriter osw = new OutputStreamWriter(zos);
126 
127         Thread.currentThread().setContextClassLoader(
128                 getClass().getClassLoader());
129 
130         TransformerFactory tf = TransformerFactory.newInstance();
131         if (!tf.getFeature(SAXSource.FEATURE)
132                 || !tf.getFeature(SAXResult.FEATURE)) {
133             return 0;
134         }
135 
136         SAXTransformerFactory saxtf = (SAXTransformerFactory) tf;
137         Templates templates = null;
138         if (xslt != null) {
139             templates = saxtf.newTemplates(xslt);
140         }
141 
142         // configuring outHandlerFactory
143         // ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////
144 
145         EntryElement entryElement = getEntryElement(zos);
146 
147         ContentHandler outDocHandler = null;
148         switch (outRepresentation) {
149         case BYTECODE:
150             outDocHandler = new OutputSlicingHandler(
151                     new ASMContentHandlerFactory(zos), entryElement, false);
152             break;
153 
154         case MULTI_XML:
155             outDocHandler = new OutputSlicingHandler(new SAXWriterFactory(osw,
156                     true), entryElement, true);
157             break;
158 
159         case SINGLE_XML:
160             ZipEntry outputEntry = new ZipEntry(SINGLE_XML_NAME);
161             zos.putNextEntry(outputEntry);
162             outDocHandler = new SAXWriter(osw, false);
163             break;
164 
165         }
166 
167         // configuring inputDocHandlerFactory
168         // /////////////////////////////////////////////////
169         ContentHandler inDocHandler;
170         if (templates == null) {
171             inDocHandler = outDocHandler;
172         } else {
173             inDocHandler = new InputSlicingHandler("class", outDocHandler,
174                     new TransformerHandlerFactory(saxtf, templates,
175                             outDocHandler));
176         }
177         ContentHandlerFactory inDocHandlerFactory = new SubdocumentHandlerFactory(
178                 inDocHandler);
179 
180         if (inDocHandler != null && inRepresentation != SINGLE_XML) {
181             inDocHandler.startDocument();
182             inDocHandler.startElement("", "classes", "classes",
183                     new AttributesImpl());
184         }
185 
186         int i = 0;
187         ZipEntry ze;
188         while ((ze = zis.getNextEntry()) != null) {
189             update(ze.getName(), n++);
190             if (isClassEntry(ze)) {
191                 processEntry(zis, ze, inDocHandlerFactory);
192             } else {
193                 OutputStream os = entryElement.openEntry(getName(ze));
194                 copyEntry(zis, os);
195                 entryElement.closeEntry();
196             }
197 
198             i++;
199         }
200 
201         if (inDocHandler != null && inRepresentation != SINGLE_XML) {
202             inDocHandler.endElement("", "classes", "classes");
203             inDocHandler.endDocument();
204         }
205 
206         if (outRepresentation == SINGLE_XML) {
207             zos.closeEntry();
208         }
209         zos.flush();
210         zos.close();
211 
212         return i;
213     }
214 
215     private void copyEntry(final InputStream is, final OutputStream os)
216             throws IOException {
217         if (outRepresentation == SINGLE_XML) {
218             return;
219         }
220 
221         byte[] buff = new byte[2048];
222         int i;
223         while ((i = is.read(buff)) != -1) {
224             os.write(buff, 0, i);
225         }
226     }
227 
228     private boolean isClassEntry(final ZipEntry ze) {
229         String name = ze.getName();
230         return inRepresentation == SINGLE_XML && name.equals(SINGLE_XML_NAME)
231                 || name.endsWith(".class") || name.endsWith(".class.xml");
232     }
233 
234     private void processEntry(final ZipInputStream zis, final ZipEntry ze,
235             final ContentHandlerFactory handlerFactory) {
236         ContentHandler handler = handlerFactory.createContentHandler();
237         try {
238 
239             // if (CODE2ASM.equals(command)) { // read bytecode and process it
240             // // with TraceClassVisitor
241             // ClassReader cr = new ClassReader(readEntry(zis, ze));
242             // cr.accept(new TraceClassVisitor(null, new PrintWriter(os)),
243             // false);
244             // }
245 
246             boolean singleInputDocument = inRepresentation == SINGLE_XML;
247             if (inRepresentation == BYTECODE) { // read bytecode and process it
248                 // with handler
249                 ClassReader cr = new ClassReader(readEntry(zis, ze));
250                 cr.accept(new SAXClassAdapter(handler, singleInputDocument), 0);
251 
252             } else { // read XML and process it with handler
253                 XMLReader reader = XMLReaderFactory.createXMLReader();
254                 reader.setContentHandler(handler);
255                 reader.parse(new InputSource(
256                         singleInputDocument ? (InputStream) new ProtectedInputStream(
257                                 zis) : new ByteArrayInputStream(readEntry(zis,
258                                 ze))));
259 
260             }
261         } catch (Exception ex) {
262             update(ze.getName(), 0);
263             update(ex, 0);
264         }
265     }
266 
267     private EntryElement getEntryElement(final ZipOutputStream zos) {
268         if (outRepresentation == SINGLE_XML) {
269             return new SingleDocElement(zos);
270         }
271         return new ZipEntryElement(zos);
272     }
273 
274     // private ContentHandlerFactory getHandlerFactory(
275     // OutputStream os,
276     // SAXTransformerFactory saxtf,
277     // Templates templates)
278     // {
279     // ContentHandlerFactory factory = null;
280     // if (templates == null) {
281     // if (outputRepresentation == BYTECODE) { // factory used to write
282     // // bytecode
283     // factory = new ASMContentHandlerFactory(os, computeMax);
284     // } else { // factory used to write XML
285     // factory = new SAXWriterFactory(os, true);
286     // }
287     // } else {
288     // if (outputRepresentation == BYTECODE) { // factory used to transform
289     // // and then write bytecode
290     // factory = new ASMTransformerHandlerFactory(saxtf,
291     // templates,
292     // os,
293     // computeMax);
294     // } else { // factory used to transformand then write XML
295     // factory = new TransformerHandlerFactory(saxtf,
296     // templates,
297     // os,
298     // outputRepresentation == SINGLE_XML);
299     // }
300     // }
301     // return factory;
302     // }
303 
304     private String getName(final ZipEntry ze) {
305         String name = ze.getName();
306         if (isClassEntry(ze)) {
307             if (inRepresentation != BYTECODE && outRepresentation == BYTECODE) {
308                 name = name.substring(0, name.length() - 4); // .class.xml to
309                 // .class
310             } else if (inRepresentation == BYTECODE
311                     && outRepresentation != BYTECODE) {
312                 name += ".xml"; // .class to .class.xml
313             }
314             // } else if( CODE2ASM.equals( command)) {
315             // name = name.substring( 0, name.length()-6).concat( ".asm");
316         }
317         return name;
318     }
319 
320     private static byte[] readEntry(final InputStream zis, final ZipEntry ze)
321             throws IOException {
322         long size = ze.getSize();
323         if (size > -1) {
324             byte[] buff = new byte[(int) size];
325             int k = 0;
326             int n;
327             while ((n = zis.read(buff, k, buff.length - k)) > 0) {
328                 k += n;
329             }
330             return buff;
331         }
332 
333         ByteArrayOutputStream bos = new ByteArrayOutputStream();
334         byte[] buff = new byte[4096];
335         int i;
336         while ((i = zis.read(buff)) != -1) {
337             bos.write(buff, 0, i);
338         }
339         return bos.toByteArray();
340     }
341 
342     /*
343      * (non-Javadoc)
344      * 
345      * @see java.util.Observer#update(java.util.Observable, java.lang.Object)
346      */
347     protected void update(final Object arg, final int n) {
348         if (arg instanceof Throwable) {
349             ((Throwable) arg).printStackTrace();
350         } else {
351             if (n % 100 == 0) {
352                 System.err.println(n + " " + arg);
353             }
354         }
355     }
356 
357     public static void main(final String[] args) throws Exception {
358         if (args.length < 2) {
359             showUsage();
360             return;
361         }
362 
363         int inRepresentation = getRepresentation(args[0]);
364         int outRepresentation = getRepresentation(args[1]);
365 
366         InputStream is = System.in;
367         OutputStream os = new BufferedOutputStream(System.out);
368 
369         Source xslt = null;
370         // boolean computeMax = true;
371 
372         for (int i = 2; i < args.length; i++) {
373             if ("-in".equals(args[i])) {
374                 is = new FileInputStream(args[++i]);
375 
376             } else if ("-out".equals(args[i])) {
377                 os = new BufferedOutputStream(new FileOutputStream(args[++i]));
378 
379             } else if ("-xslt".equals(args[i])) {
380                 xslt = new StreamSource(new FileInputStream(args[++i]));
381 
382                 // } else if( "-computemax".equals( args[ i].toLowerCase())) {
383                 // computeMax = true;
384 
385             } else {
386                 showUsage();
387                 return;
388 
389             }
390         }
391 
392         if (inRepresentation == 0 || outRepresentation == 0) {
393             showUsage();
394             return;
395         }
396 
397         Processor m = new Processor(inRepresentation, outRepresentation, is,
398                 os, xslt);
399 
400         long l1 = System.currentTimeMillis();
401         int n = m.process();
402         long l2 = System.currentTimeMillis();
403         System.err.println(n);
404         System.err.println((l2 - l1) + "ms  " + 1000f * n / (l2 - l1)
405                 + " resources/sec");
406     }
407 
408     private static int getRepresentation(final String s) {
409         if ("code".equals(s)) {
410             return BYTECODE;
411         } else if ("xml".equals(s)) {
412             return MULTI_XML;
413         } else if ("singlexml".equals(s)) {
414             return SINGLE_XML;
415         }
416         return 0;
417     }
418 
419     private static void showUsage() {
420         System.err
421                 .println("Usage: Main <in format> <out format> [-in <input jar>] [-out <output jar>] [-xslt <xslt fiel>]");
422         System.err
423                 .println("  when -in or -out is omitted sysin and sysout would be used");
424         System.err
425                 .println("  <in format> and <out format> - code | xml | singlexml");
426     }
427 
428     /**
429      * IputStream wrapper class used to protect input streams from being closed
430      * by some stupid XML parsers.
431      */
432     private static final class ProtectedInputStream extends InputStream {
433         private final InputStream is;
434 
435         ProtectedInputStream(final InputStream is) {
436             this.is = is;
437         }
438 
439         @Override
440         public final void close() throws IOException {
441         }
442 
443         @Override
444         public final int read() throws IOException {
445             return is.read();
446         }
447 
448         @Override
449         public final int read(final byte[] b, final int off, final int len)
450                 throws IOException {
451             return is.read(b, off, len);
452         }
453 
454         @Override
455         public final int available() throws IOException {
456             return is.available();
457         }
458     }
459 
460     /**
461      * A {@link ContentHandlerFactory ContentHandlerFactory} is used to create
462      * {@link org.xml.sax.ContentHandler ContentHandler} instances for concrete
463      * context.
464      */
465     private static interface ContentHandlerFactory {
466 
467         /**
468          * Creates an instance of the content handler.
469          * 
470          * @return content handler
471          */
472         ContentHandler createContentHandler();
473 
474     }
475 
476     /**
477      * SAXWriterFactory
478      */
479     private static final class SAXWriterFactory implements
480             ContentHandlerFactory {
481         private final Writer w;
482 
483         private final boolean optimizeEmptyElements;
484 
485         SAXWriterFactory(final Writer w, final boolean optimizeEmptyElements) {
486             this.w = w;
487             this.optimizeEmptyElements = optimizeEmptyElements;
488         }
489 
490         public final ContentHandler createContentHandler() {
491             return new SAXWriter(w, optimizeEmptyElements);
492         }
493 
494     }
495 
496     /**
497      * ASMContentHandlerFactory
498      */
499     private static final class ASMContentHandlerFactory implements
500             ContentHandlerFactory {
501         final OutputStream os;
502 
503         ASMContentHandlerFactory(final OutputStream os) {
504             this.os = os;
505         }
506 
507         public final ContentHandler createContentHandler() {
508             final ClassWriter cw = new ClassWriter(ClassWriter.COMPUTE_MAXS);
509             return new ASMContentHandler(cw) {
510                 @Override
511                 public void endDocument() throws SAXException {
512                     try {
513                         os.write(cw.toByteArray());
514                     } catch (IOException e) {
515                         throw new SAXException(e);
516                     }
517                 }
518             };
519         }
520 
521     }
522 
523     /**
524      * TransformerHandlerFactory
525      */
526     private static final class TransformerHandlerFactory implements
527             ContentHandlerFactory {
528         private SAXTransformerFactory saxtf;
529 
530         private final Templates templates;
531 
532         private ContentHandler outputHandler;
533 
534         TransformerHandlerFactory(final SAXTransformerFactory saxtf,
535                 final Templates templates, final ContentHandler outputHandler) {
536             this.saxtf = saxtf;
537             this.templates = templates;
538             this.outputHandler = outputHandler;
539         }
540 
541         public final ContentHandler createContentHandler() {
542             try {
543                 TransformerHandler handler = saxtf
544                         .newTransformerHandler(templates);
545                 handler.setResult(new SAXResult(outputHandler));
546                 return handler;
547             } catch (TransformerConfigurationException ex) {
548                 throw new RuntimeException(ex.toString());
549             }
550         }
551     }
552 
553     /**
554      * SubdocumentHandlerFactory
555      */
556     private static final class SubdocumentHandlerFactory implements
557             ContentHandlerFactory {
558         private final ContentHandler subdocumentHandler;
559 
560         SubdocumentHandlerFactory(final ContentHandler subdocumentHandler) {
561             this.subdocumentHandler = subdocumentHandler;
562         }
563 
564         public final ContentHandler createContentHandler() {
565             return subdocumentHandler;
566         }
567 
568     }
569 
570     /**
571      * A {@link org.xml.sax.ContentHandler ContentHandler} and
572      * {@link org.xml.sax.ext.LexicalHandler LexicalHandler} that serializes XML
573      * from SAX 2.0 events into {@link java.io.Writer Writer}.
574      * 
575      * <i><blockquote> This implementation does not support namespaces, entity
576      * definitions (uncluding DTD), CDATA and text elements. </blockquote></i>
577      */
578     private static final class SAXWriter extends DefaultHandler implements
579             LexicalHandler {
580         private static final char[] OFF = "                                                                                                        "
581                 .toCharArray();
582 
583         private Writer w;
584 
585         private final boolean optimizeEmptyElements;
586 
587         private boolean openElement = false;
588 
589         private int ident = 0;
590 
591         /**
592          * Creates <code>SAXWriter</code>.
593          * 
594          * @param w
595          *            writer
596          * @param optimizeEmptyElements
597          *            if set to <code>true</code>, short XML syntax will be used
598          *            for empty elements
599          */
600         SAXWriter(final Writer w, final boolean optimizeEmptyElements) {
601             this.w = w;
602             this.optimizeEmptyElements = optimizeEmptyElements;
603         }
604 
605         @Override
606         public final void startElement(final String ns, final String localName,
607                 final String qName, final Attributes atts) throws SAXException {
608             try {
609                 closeElement();
610 
611                 writeIdent();
612                 w.write('<' + qName);
613                 if (atts != null && atts.getLength() > 0) {
614                     writeAttributes(atts);
615                 }
616 
617                 if (optimizeEmptyElements) {
618                     openElement = true;
619                 } else {
620                     w.write(">\n");
621                 }
622                 ident += 2;
623 
624             } catch (IOException ex) {
625                 throw new SAXException(ex);
626 
627             }
628         }
629 
630         @Override
631         public final void endElement(final String ns, final String localName,
632                 final String qName) throws SAXException {
633             ident -= 2;
634             try {
635                 if (openElement) {
636                     w.write("/>\n");
637                     openElement = false;
638                 } else {
639                     writeIdent();
640                     w.write("</" + qName + ">\n");
641                 }
642 
643             } catch (IOException ex) {
644                 throw new SAXException(ex);
645 
646             }
647         }
648 
649         @Override
650         public final void endDocument() throws SAXException {
651             try {
652                 w.flush();
653 
654             } catch (IOException ex) {
655                 throw new SAXException(ex);
656 
657             }
658         }
659 
660         public final void comment(final char[] ch, final int off, final int len)
661                 throws SAXException {
662             try {
663                 closeElement();
664 
665                 writeIdent();
666                 w.write("<!-- ");
667                 w.write(ch, off, len);
668                 w.write(" -->\n");
669 
670             } catch (IOException ex) {
671                 throw new SAXException(ex);
672 
673             }
674         }
675 
676         public final void startDTD(final String arg0, final String arg1,
677                 final String arg2) throws SAXException {
678         }
679 
680         public final void endDTD() throws SAXException {
681         }
682 
683         public final void startEntity(final String arg0) throws SAXException {
684         }
685 
686         public final void endEntity(final String arg0) throws SAXException {
687         }
688 
689         public final void startCDATA() throws SAXException {
690         }
691 
692         public final void endCDATA() throws SAXException {
693         }
694 
695         private final void writeAttributes(final Attributes atts)
696                 throws IOException {
697             StringBuffer sb = new StringBuffer();
698             int len = atts.getLength();
699             for (int i = 0; i < len; i++) {
700                 sb.append(' ').append(atts.getLocalName(i)).append("=\"")
701                         .append(esc(atts.getValue(i))).append('\"');
702             }
703             w.write(sb.toString());
704         }
705 
706         /**
707          * Encode string with escaping.
708          * 
709          * @param str
710          *            string to encode.
711          * @return encoded string
712          */
713         private static final String esc(final String str) {
714             StringBuffer sb = new StringBuffer(str.length());
715             for (int i = 0; i < str.length(); i++) {
716                 char ch = str.charAt(i);
717                 switch (ch) {
718                 case '&':
719                     sb.append("&amp;");
720                     break;
721 
722                 case '<':
723                     sb.append("&lt;");
724                     break;
725 
726                 case '>':
727                     sb.append("&gt;");
728                     break;
729 
730                 case '\"':
731                     sb.append("&quot;");
732                     break;
733 
734                 default:
735                     if (ch > 0x7f) {
736                         sb.append("&#").append(Integer.toString(ch))
737                                 .append(';');
738                     } else {
739                         sb.append(ch);
740                     }
741 
742                 }
743             }
744             return sb.toString();
745         }
746 
747         private final void writeIdent() throws IOException {
748             int n = ident;
749             while (n > 0) {
750                 if (n > OFF.length) {
751                     w.write(OFF);
752                     n -= OFF.length;
753                 } else {
754                     w.write(OFF, 0, n);
755                     n = 0;
756                 }
757             }
758         }
759 
760         private final void closeElement() throws IOException {
761             if (openElement) {
762                 w.write(">\n");
763             }
764             openElement = false;
765         }
766 
767     }
768 
769     /**
770      * A {@link org.xml.sax.ContentHandler ContentHandler} that splits XML
771      * documents into smaller chunks. Each chunk is processed by the nested
772      * {@link org.xml.sax.ContentHandler ContentHandler} obtained from
773      * {@link java.net.ContentHandlerFactory ContentHandlerFactory}. This is
774      * useful for running XSLT engine against large XML document that will
775      * hardly fit into the memory all together.
776      *
777      * TODO use complete path for subdocumentRoot
778      */
779     private static final class InputSlicingHandler extends DefaultHandler {
780         private String subdocumentRoot;
781 
782         private final ContentHandler rootHandler;
783 
784         private ContentHandlerFactory subdocumentHandlerFactory;
785 
786         private boolean subdocument = false;
787 
788         private ContentHandler subdocumentHandler;
789 
790         /**
791          * Constructs a new {@link InputSlicingHandler SubdocumentHandler}
792          * object.
793          * 
794          * @param subdocumentRoot
795          *            name/path to the root element of the subdocument
796          * @param rootHandler
797          *            content handler for the entire document (subdocument
798          *            envelope).
799          * @param subdocumentHandlerFactory
800          *            a {@link ContentHandlerFactory ContentHandlerFactory} used
801          *            to create {@link ContentHandler ContentHandler} instances
802          *            for subdocuments.
803          */
804         InputSlicingHandler(final String subdocumentRoot,
805                 final ContentHandler rootHandler,
806                 final ContentHandlerFactory subdocumentHandlerFactory) {
807             this.subdocumentRoot = subdocumentRoot;
808             this.rootHandler = rootHandler;
809             this.subdocumentHandlerFactory = subdocumentHandlerFactory;
810         }
811 
812         @Override
813         public final void startElement(final String namespaceURI,
814                 final String localName, final String qName,
815                 final Attributes list) throws SAXException {
816             if (subdocument) {
817                 subdocumentHandler.startElement(namespaceURI, localName, qName,
818                         list);
819             } else if (localName.equals(subdocumentRoot)) {
820                 subdocumentHandler = subdocumentHandlerFactory
821                         .createContentHandler();
822                 subdocumentHandler.startDocument();
823                 subdocumentHandler.startElement(namespaceURI, localName, qName,
824                         list);
825                 subdocument = true;
826             } else if (rootHandler != null) {
827                 rootHandler.startElement(namespaceURI, localName, qName, list);
828             }
829         }
830 
831         @Override
832         public final void endElement(final String namespaceURI,
833                 final String localName, final String qName) throws SAXException {
834             if (subdocument) {
835                 subdocumentHandler.endElement(namespaceURI, localName, qName);
836                 if (localName.equals(subdocumentRoot)) {
837                     subdocumentHandler.endDocument();
838                     subdocument = false;
839                 }
840             } else if (rootHandler != null) {
841                 rootHandler.endElement(namespaceURI, localName, qName);
842             }
843         }
844 
845         @Override
846         public final void startDocument() throws SAXException {
847             if (rootHandler != null) {
848                 rootHandler.startDocument();
849             }
850         }
851 
852         @Override
853         public final void endDocument() throws SAXException {
854             if (rootHandler != null) {
855                 rootHandler.endDocument();
856 
857             }
858         }
859 
860         @Override
861         public final void characters(final char[] buff, final int offset,
862                 final int size) throws SAXException {
863             if (subdocument) {
864                 subdocumentHandler.characters(buff, offset, size);
865             } else if (rootHandler != null) {
866                 rootHandler.characters(buff, offset, size);
867             }
868         }
869 
870     }
871 
872     /**
873      * A {@link org.xml.sax.ContentHandler ContentHandler} that splits XML
874      * documents into smaller chunks. Each chunk is processed by the nested
875      * {@link org.xml.sax.ContentHandler ContentHandler} obtained from
876      * {@link java.net.ContentHandlerFactory ContentHandlerFactory}. This is
877      * useful for running XSLT engine against large XML document that will
878      * hardly fit into the memory all together.
879      * 
880      *
881      * TODO use complete path for subdocumentRoot
882      */
883     private static final class OutputSlicingHandler extends DefaultHandler {
884         private final String subdocumentRoot;
885 
886         private ContentHandlerFactory subdocumentHandlerFactory;
887 
888         private final EntryElement entryElement;
889 
890         private boolean isXml;
891 
892         private boolean subdocument = false;
893 
894         private ContentHandler subdocumentHandler;
895 
896         /**
897          * Constructs a new {@link OutputSlicingHandler SubdocumentHandler}
898          * object.
899          * 
900          * @param subdocumentHandlerFactory
901          *            a {@link ContentHandlerFactory ContentHandlerFactory} used
902          *            to create {@link ContentHandler ContentHandler} instances
903          *            for subdocuments.
904          * @param entryElement
905          *            TODO.
906          * @param isXml
907          *            TODO.
908          */
909         OutputSlicingHandler(
910                 final ContentHandlerFactory subdocumentHandlerFactory,
911                 final EntryElement entryElement, final boolean isXml) {
912             this.subdocumentRoot = "class";
913             this.subdocumentHandlerFactory = subdocumentHandlerFactory;
914             this.entryElement = entryElement;
915             this.isXml = isXml;
916         }
917 
918         @Override
919         public final void startElement(final String namespaceURI,
920                 final String localName, final String qName,
921                 final Attributes list) throws SAXException {
922             if (subdocument) {
923                 subdocumentHandler.startElement(namespaceURI, localName, qName,
924                         list);
925             } else if (localName.equals(subdocumentRoot)) {
926                 String name = list.getValue("name");
927                 if (name == null || name.length() == 0) {
928                     throw new SAXException(
929                             "Class element without name attribute.");
930                 }
931                 try {
932                     entryElement.openEntry(isXml ? name + ".class.xml" : name
933                             + ".class");
934                 } catch (IOException ex) {
935                     throw new SAXException(ex.toString(), ex);
936                 }
937                 subdocumentHandler = subdocumentHandlerFactory
938                         .createContentHandler();
939                 subdocumentHandler.startDocument();
940                 subdocumentHandler.startElement(namespaceURI, localName, qName,
941                         list);
942                 subdocument = true;
943             }
944         }
945 
946         @Override
947         public final void endElement(final String namespaceURI,
948                 final String localName, final String qName) throws SAXException {
949             if (subdocument) {
950                 subdocumentHandler.endElement(namespaceURI, localName, qName);
951                 if (localName.equals(subdocumentRoot)) {
952                     subdocumentHandler.endDocument();
953                     subdocument = false;
954                     try {
955                         entryElement.closeEntry();
956                     } catch (IOException ex) {
957                         throw new SAXException(ex.toString(), ex);
958                     }
959                 }
960             }
961         }
962 
963         @Override
964         public final void startDocument() throws SAXException {
965         }
966 
967         @Override
968         public final void endDocument() throws SAXException {
969         }
970 
971         @Override
972         public final void characters(final char[] buff, final int offset,
973                 final int size) throws SAXException {
974             if (subdocument) {
975                 subdocumentHandler.characters(buff, offset, size);
976             }
977         }
978 
979     }
980 
981     private static interface EntryElement {
982 
983         OutputStream openEntry(String name) throws IOException;
984 
985         void closeEntry() throws IOException;
986 
987     }
988 
989     private static final class SingleDocElement implements EntryElement {
990         private final OutputStream os;
991 
992         SingleDocElement(final OutputStream os) {
993             this.os = os;
994         }
995 
996         public OutputStream openEntry(final String name) throws IOException {
997             return os;
998         }
999 
1000         public void closeEntry() throws IOException {
1001             os.flush();
1002         }
1003 
1004     }
1005 
1006     private static final class ZipEntryElement implements EntryElement {
1007         private ZipOutputStream zos;
1008 
1009         ZipEntryElement(final ZipOutputStream zos) {
1010             this.zos = zos;
1011         }
1012 
1013         public OutputStream openEntry(final String name) throws IOException {
1014             ZipEntry entry = new ZipEntry(name);
1015             zos.putNextEntry(entry);
1016             return zos;
1017         }
1018 
1019         public void closeEntry() throws IOException {
1020             zos.flush();
1021             zos.closeEntry();
1022         }
1023 
1024     }
1025 
1026 }
